sourcesContent:
Top Players of Overwatch

{{top.gamertag}} | W/L: {{top.winLossRatio}} | K/D: {{top.killDeathRatio}} | Hours Played: {{top.timePlayed}} | Rank: {{top.playerRank}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TopPerGame } from '../types'; import { LeaderboardService } from '../leaderboard.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-q3-ow2', templateUrl: './q3-ow2.component.html', styleUrls: ['./q3-ow2.component.css'] }) export class Q3Ow2Component implements OnInit{ TopPerGames: TopPerGame[] = []; constructor( private leaderboardService: LeaderboardService, private router: Router, ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.leaderboardService.getTopPerGame(1) .subscribe(TopPerGames => this.TopPerGames = TopPerGames); } }
